data.message: I'm missing an entire album of photos from my page. Can someone help me with this? I didn't delete them, they're just gone. How do I get them back?

replies.message: Hi, Amanda. If something isn't working on Facebook, please let us know more: http://bit.ly/2oSBQfo -Rhea
I've already reported it. I've sent messages to you. The pictures are still missing. I want my pictures back. It's an album of my daughter since her birth. I can't replace some of these pictures.

They stole my 7 year account, in March. I sent my identification in 2010, I'm losing my leads which means no new business which interrupting my cash flow. I sent them a schedule fee, no response, which in courts of law are binding contracts. No response in full respect of your wishes for your property is the same as acceptance. As far as all Supreme Court cases concerning schedule fess states
I don't understand why they ignore some but help others.
I am missing many albums! Pictures from my daughters first year are all gone as well! What is going on?! Facebook

Speaking of albums. Why is it that when I want to post a picture from my Android phone that I have to search through my entire library of photos? Android phones have had a system for sorting photos into categories for several years now. I can page through my photos from Facebook, pictures I've downloaded from my web browser, photos I've taken with my camera, photos I've saved from other apps, etc. Other apps I use are aware of this and make finding the picture I'm looking for way easier. Another problem when searching through pictures to post to FB is they get scrambled into seemingly random order. A few of my most recent photos will show up at the top, but eventually they will end up somewhere in the middle or even tword the bottom. Please address this issue. I'm surprised it's still going on tbh.
